overview: On a stormy summer night, Mathieu walks in on his parents. Horrified, he shares his disturbing discovery with his friends on a fishing trip and begins to ask some big questions. Faced with the loss of his innocence, Mathieu sets himself a mission. He’s going to make sure his parents don’t do the unforgiveable: bring another child into a burning world.
tagline: As the planet dies, the adults are getting it on. In a stroke of good luck, Mathieu discovers a contraceptive far more effective than condoms.
title: Oeil pour oeil
